name: mkdocs
tagline: A static site generator designed for project documentation
description: MkDocs is a static site generator designed for building documentation using Markdown. It features a live preview server, theming options, and a large plugin ecosystem, making it ideal for technical docs.

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Write documentation in plain Markdown files organized in a simple folder structure

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Choose from Material, ReadTheDocs, and other themes or create custom designs with templates

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Extend functionality with plugins for search, PDF generation, diagrams, and content processing

features.title: Search Integration
features.description: Add full-text search to documentation sites without external services using built-in indexing

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Generate fast, SEO-friendly HTML sites that can be hosted anywhere without server requirements
